content:
Diagnosis:		Cecal medullary carcinoma

Management:		15 Jan 2024 Right hemicolectomy
			Completed adjuvant CAPOX chemotherapy March 2024

Histology:		pT3N1(2/15)M0 medullary carcinoma
			MSI-high, TMB-high

Current situation:	Routine surveillance review

[redacted name] attended clinic today for first surveillance review following completion of adjuvant chemotherapy. She has recovered well from her treatment with resolution of peripheral neuropathy symptoms. Her bowel function has normalized with 2-3 formed motions daily. Weight is stable at 68kg and appetite good. Blood results show CEA remains normal at 2.4. Performance status is 0.

I have arranged CT chest/abdomen/pelvis for 3 months' time and will review her with the results. She understands to contact us sooner if any new concerns develop.

status_updates.value: Stage III cecal medullary carcinoma post surgery and adjuvant chemotherapy. First surveillance review showing good recovery from treatment.
Review with CT results in 3 months
